Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and interests. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an excellent chance to secure such a high-quality item at a discount. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction promptly. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
